overview: -Kraftwerk:0100-013-0-2005-011(Tilburg NL 1 July 2005), VERY RARE! 2005 Extremely issue 18-trk live DVD on Crime Crow label, full digipack p/s(Crime Crow CCPDVD045)  Original Shooting, Artwork & Authoring : Nafoute Audio : KZ  "Stolen", reworked and reauthored by Crime Crow productions (bastards).  Compared to my originals DVDs : - The colours are enhanced - The image has been slightly cropped - More contrast but less details - The Nafoute TV logo has been blurred away
title: Kraftwerk - 0100-013-0-2005-0100
